title: Seeking nominations for top executives who are leading in the sports betting space
text:
Business Insider is launching a list of power players who are leading in the sports gambling space.

We want to hear from you on which execs have successfully found new ways to leverage legalized sports betting in the last year.

Please submit your ideas through this form by October 31.

Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories.

Legalized sports gambling has grown into a $10 billion business since the US Supreme Court lifted a federal ban on sports betting last year.

The opportunities are growing as more states move toward legalizing the activity.

We are seeking nominations for Business Insider's first list of power players who are successfully leveraging legalized sports betting in innovative ways.

Please submit your ideas through this form by October 31.

We're looking for top executives at entertainment and media companies, major sports leagues, or tech platforms. These execs have found unique ways to enable or capitalize on the audience for sports gambling in the last year.

The list will be determined by Business Insider based on our reporting and the nominations that we receive. It will factor in the executive's responsibilities, scope of the changes introduced, and impact on the sports betting space broadly.
description: Business Insider is launching a list of power players in the sports gambling space. We want to hear from you.
